go_game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • go_game.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for keeping a player in the Go game.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Michiel Klitsie
